activities: Avature operates as a computer services provider of recruiting systems. Avature is an application service provider for our corporate customers who upload their staffing data (including personal information of prospective candidates and employees) to the Avature-hosted environment. This data may be transferred to or stored in the US. Once the data is stored, our customers access our solution and their data for staffing purposes. Individuals involved in these recruitment and staffing activities interact directly with Avature’s customers, rather than with Avature. Avature is a “data processor” for our customers, who operate as “controllers” of Personal Information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, human resources, customer's employees and prospective employees, client's contacts.
recoursemech: For complaints and disputes that cannot be resolved between the Company and the complainant, the Company has agreed to cooperate and comply with the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland. The contact information for the Swiss FDPIC can be found at:  http://www.edoeb.admin.ch/kontakt/index.html?lang=en
